Scan Process

The scan process will:

  1. Identify unscanned albums in your Plex library
  2. Search for each album on the selected site
  3. Create mappings between Plex items and site groups
  4. Store associated tags for collection creation
Note: This is an incremental process. Only albums without existing mappings will be processed.
